Name: The Legend of the War Axe
About the game: A fantasy world in which battles never cease. Humans, elves and the damned are constantly at war with each other. A sword or an ax, arrows or buckshot or can blow them all up? When choosing a hero class, you choose the style of play and its strengths and weaknesses. Or maybe you want to become one of the three bosses and let other players arrange raids on you. The Legend of the War Ax is a fast-paced, real-time, third-person PvP battle. Currently, 10 characters are available for which you can play. The game will be constantly evolving and supplemented with new characters, bosses and territories.
